attributes.action: Liverpool Shop Fearing Closure Because of Cars Littering the Shop Face
attributes.additional_details:
Local family-run business Trophies For All is losing out on a lot of business because of the amount of cars parking outside of the shop and leaving the vehicles there all day until they go home.

The building site opposite, Laing O'Rourke builders working on the Alder Hay build have been parking outside of the shop which has led to many customers being unable to park or just leaving coming into the shop because they think the shop is "too busy".

Laing O'Rourke have ignored our demands for a single yellow like to be put outside of the shop so people stop parking their vehicles there from 9am until the end of the day.

Other businesses around the area are suffering all the same too.

Trophies For All has been around for nine years now, started from scratch as a family-run business but is now fearing closure. The build won't finish until September 2015.

All we want is a yellow line to be sprayed outside the shop.
